Message.Title: TIGR yolink one ups goog
Message.Msg: turning WordPress search on its head, launching a new blog platform search tool, with the help of WP Engine. What Yolink set out to do is address the standing issues with WordPress search, which sorts results according to date by default. There have been several solutions presented for WordPress over the years, from blog network tools to Custom Google Search, but Yolinkâ€™s trying to one-up them all
